After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Percentage of telemetry data that is accurate and reliable compared to the total amount of telemetry data collected.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Accurate Telemetry Data Points / Total Telemetry Data Points) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to analyze telemetry data from collection to the generation of insights, reflecting the efficiency of the analysis process.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Analyze Telemetry Data

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Measure of how effectively telemetry data is integrated with other systems and processes, reflecting the quality of data integration efforts.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Number of Efficient Data Integrations / Total Number of Data Integrations) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from telemetry analysis.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from telemetry analysis activities compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Telemetry Analysis / Total Cost of Telemetry Analysis) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Rate at which actionable insights are generated from telemetry data analysis, measured by the number of insights produced over a specified period.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Number of Insights Generated / Total Number of Analyses) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.KPIS: Telemetry analysis cost per data point.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to analyze each data point collected through telemetry, including data processing and analysis expenses.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: Total Cost of Telemetry Analysis / Total Number of Data Points

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Degree to which telemetry data collection and handling comply with data security regulations and best practices, measured through audits and security assessments.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Number of Secure Data Instances / Total Number of Data Instances) * 100

After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.KPIS: Telemetry analysis improvement in operational efficiency.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.EXPLANATION: Measure of how telemetry analysis improves operational efficiency, based on metrics like performance improvements and cost savings.
After Sales+Vehicle Health Monitoring+Te.FORMULA: (Operational Efficiency After Telemetry Analysis - Operational Efficiency Before Telemetry Analysis) / Operational Efficiency Before Telemetry Analysis * 100
